DOC.brief_summary: The principal aim of this study is to evaluate the presence of changes in cervical vestibular evoked myogenic potentials (VEMPc) after acute intake of caffeine in healthy subjects. Secondarily, it wants to standardize normal values exam VEMPc in otorhinolaryngology service of the hospital.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Caffeine on Vestibular Evoked Myogenic Potentials in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: healthy subjects hearing impairment caffeine abuse 24 hours before the test medication remains hypertension, dyslipidemia, diabetes mellitus or sleep disorders.
